quote: Part of the journey is the end.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Tony, trying to get you to stop has been one of the few failures of my entire life.
author: ~ Pepper Potts

quote: No amount of money ever bought a second of time.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: You know, I keep telling everybody they should move on and grow. Some do. But not us.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: It's not about how much we lost. It's about how much we have left.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: No mistakes. No do-overs. Look out for each other. This is the fight of our lives.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
author: ~ Thanos

quote: Today we don’t fight for one life, we fight for all of them.
author: ~ Black Panther

quote: It’s not enough to be against something. You have to be for something better.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I would rather be a good man than a great king.
author: ~ Thor

quote: I choose to run towards my problems, and not away from them. Because’s that– because’s that what heroes do.
author: ~ Thor

quote: But a thing isn’t beautiful because it lasts. It’s a privilege to be among them.
author: ~ Vision

quote: The world has changed and none of us can go back. All we can do is our best, and sometimes the best that we can do is to start over.
author: ~ Peggy Carter

quote: Teach Me.
author: ~ Stephen Strange

quote: Faith is my sword. Truth is my shield. Knowledge my armor.
author: ~ Stephen Strange

quote: I had my eyes opened. I came to realize that I had more to offer this world than just making things that blow up.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: No man can win every battle, but no man should fall without a struggle.
author: ~ Peter Parker

quote: I am Iron Man.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Hulk smash!
author: ~ Bruce Banner

quote: Hulk smash!
author: ~ Bruce Banner

quote: I don't know what you've got inside you already. The mix could be… an abomination.
author: ~ Samuel Sterns

quote: Look, it’s me, I’m here, deal with it. Let’s move on.
author: ~ James Rhodes

quote: How ironic, Tony. Trying to rid of the world of weapons, you gave it its best one ever! And now, I'm going to kill you with it!
author: ~ Obadiah Stane

quote: If it were any smarter, it'd write a book – a book that would make Ulysses look like it was written in crayon.
author: ~ Justin Hammer

quote: I don’t want to kill anyone. I don’t like bullies. I don’t care where they’re from.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: He will be the first in a new breed of super-soldiers. And they will personally escort Adolf Hitler to the gates of Hell.
author: ~ Colonel Phillips

quote: I can do this all day.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: That’s my secret, Captain. I’m always angry.
author: ~ Bruce Banner

quote: We have a Hulk.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: There's no throne, there is no version of this, where you come out on top. Maybe your army comes and maybe it’s too much for us, but it’s all on you. Because if we can’t protect the Earth, you can be damned well sure we’ll avenge it.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: This is so unlike you, brother. So clandestine. Are you sure you wouldn’t rather just punch your way out?
author: ~ Loki

quote: You get hurt, hurt 'em back. You get killed… walk it off.
author: ~ Captain America

quote: You never know. You hope for the best and make do with what you get.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: He just kicked your ass, full-size. You really want to find out what it's like when you can't see him coming?
author: ~ Howard Stark

quote: Activating instant kill.
author: ~ AI Karen

quote: Higher, further, faster, baby.
author: ~ Carol Danvers

quote: You call me ‘young lady' again, I'll shove my foot up somewhere it's not supposed to be.
author: ~ Maria Rambeau

quote: I have nothing to prove to you.
author: ~ Carol Danvers

quote: You got gifts, Parker. But you didn't want to be here. I'd love to have you in Berlin, but you've got to decide whether you're going to step up or not. Stark chose you. He made you an Avenger. I need that. The world needs that. Maybe Stark was wrong. The choice is yours.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: I do anything and everything that Mr. Stark requires — including occasionally taking out the trash.
author: ~ Pepper Potts

quote: Sir, I’m going to have to ask you to exit the donut.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: I told you, I don't want to join your super-secret boy band.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Drop your socks and grab your crocs, we're about to get wet on this ride.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Funny how annoying a little prick can be, isn't it?
author: ~ Senator Stern

quote: One thing I've proven is that you can count on me to pleasure myself.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: If you try to escape, or play any sort of games with me, I will taze you and watch Supernanny while you drool into the carpet.
author: ~ Agent Coulson

quote: I need a horse.
author: ~ Thor

quote: This drink, I like it. Another!
author: ~ Thor

quote: Mew-mew? What’s mew-mew?
author: ~ Darcy Lewis

quote: Does he need CPR? Because I totally know CPR.
author: ~ Darcy

quote: I’m just a kid from Brooklyn.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: So are you two…do you…fondue?
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: Geez, somebody get that kid a sandwich!
author: ~ Senator Brandt

quote: Genius. Billionaire. Playboy. Philanthropist.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Let me know if ‘real power' wants a magazine or anything.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: There’s only one God, ma’am, and I’m pretty sure he doesn’t dress like that.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: He’s adopted.
author: ~ Thor

quote: Puny god.
author: ~ Hulk

quote: You mewling quim!
author: ~ Loki

quote: Shakespeare in the park? Doth mother know you weareth her drapes?
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I understand that the council has made a decision, but given that it’s a stupid-ass decision, I’ve elected to ignore it.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: It’s good to meet you, Dr. Banner. Your work on anti-electron collisions is unparalleled. And I’m a huge fan of the way you lose control and turn into an enormous green rage monster.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: No hard feelings Point Break, you've got a mean swing.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Oh my God, that was really violent.
author: ~ Pepper Potts

quote: You walked right into this one. I've dated hotter chicks than you.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: As always sir, a great pleasure watching you work.
author: ~ JARVIS

quote: What are you waiting for? It's Christmas. Take 'em to church!
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I should not be left in charge of stuff like this. I don’t get paid enough. I don’t get paid, period.
author: ~ Darcy

quote: I can feel the righteousness surging!
author: ~ Loki

quote: Before we get started, does anyone want to get out?
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: Hey, fellas, either one of you know where the Smithsonian is? I’m here to pick up a fossil.
author: ~ Natasha Romanoff

quote: On your left.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: I do what he does, just slower.
author: ~ Sam Wilson

quote: I'm sorry, did I step on your moment?
author: ~ Black Widow

quote: I'm sorry. I took it too far. I meant trash panda.
author: ~ Peter Quill

quote: You said it yourself, bitch: We’re the Guardians of the Galaxy.
author: ~ Peter Quill

quote: Nothing goes over my head. My reflexes are too fast. I would catch it.
author: ~ Drax

quote: Finger on throat means death! Metaphor!
author: ~ Drax

quote: We are Groot.
author: ~ Groot

quote: Can you believe they call us criminals when he's assaulting us with that haircut?
author: ~ Rocket

quote: That's for when things get really hardcore… or if you wanna blow up moons.
author: ~ Rocket

quote: Asleep for the danger, awake for the money, as per frickin' usual.
author: ~ Rocket

quote: Well, now I'm standing. Happy? We're all standing now. Bunch of jackasses, standing in a circle.
author: ~ Rocket

quote: I know who you are, Peter Quill, and I am not some starry-eyed waif here to succumb to your… your pelvic sorcery!
author: ~ Gamora

quote: Filthy? Oh, she has no idea. If I had a blacklight, this would look like a Jackson Pollock painting.
author: ~ Peter Quill

quote: Language.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: The city is flying. We’re fighting an army of robots. And I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense.
author: ~ Clint Barton

quote: That's not a question I need answered.
author: ~ Natasha Romanoff

quote: Pick on someone your own size!
author: ~ Scott Lang

quote: Ah, she left me. And my mom died too. And my dad got deported. But I got the van!
author: ~ Luis

quote: Oh, no no. Daddy don't get scared.
author: ~ Luis

quote: Baskin Robbins always finds out.
author: ~ Dale

quote: So, you like cats?
author: ~ Sam Wilson

quote: Anybody on our side hiding any shocking and fantastic abilities they’d like to disclose? I’m open to suggestions.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I don't know if you've been in a fight before but there's usually not this much talking.
author: ~ Sam Wilson

quote: Just Wong? Like Adele? Or Aristotle? Drake, Bono, Eminem…
author: ~ Stephen Strange

quote: I’m Mary Poppins, y’all!
author: ~ Yondu

quote: You shouldn’t have killed my mom and squished my Walkman.
author: ~ Peter Quill

quote: We’re really gonna be able to jack up our prices if we’re two-time galaxy savers.
author: ~ Rocket

quote: I just keep imagining you waking up in the morning, sir, looking in the mirror and then in all seriousness saying to yourself, ‘You know what would be a really kickass name? Taserface!'
author: ~ Rocket

quote: Don’t do anything I would do, and definitely don’t do anything I  wouldn’t do. There’s a little gray area in there, and that’s where you operate.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Just a typical homecoming, on the outside of an invisible jet, fighting my girlfriend's dad.
author: ~ Spider-man

quote: So…you got detention.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: We know each other. He's a friend from work
author: ~ Thor

quote: I’m made of rocks, as you can see, but don’t let that intimidate you. You don’t need to be afraid, unless you’re made of scissors! Just a little rock-paper-scissors joke for you!
author: ~ Korg

quote: There was one time when we were children. He transformed himself into a snake, and he knows that I love snakes. So I went to pick up the snake to admire it, and he transformed back into himself and he was like, ‘Blech, it’s me!’ And he stabbed me. We were 8 at the time.
author: ~ Thor

quote: Guns. So primitive.
author: ~ Okoye

quote: If you say one more word, I’ll feed you to my children! I’m kidding. We’re vegetarians.
author: ~ M’Baku

quote: Dude, you’re embarrassing me in front of the wizards.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I don’t want to go.
author: ~ Peter Parker

quote: Get lost, Squidward.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: They taught it on Asgard. It was an elective.
author: ~ Thor

quote: What master do I serve? What am I supposed to say, Jesus?
author: ~ Peter Quill

quote: You want a juice box and some string cheese?
author: ~ Hank Pym

quote: If toast is cut diagonally, I can’t eat it.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: Honestly, until this exact second, I thought you were a Build-a-Bear.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I get emails from a raccoon, so nothing sounds crazy.
author: ~ Natasha Romanoff

quote: I think you look great, Cap. As far as I'm concerned, that's America's ass.
author: ~ Scott Lang

quote: That is America’s ass.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: Are you seriously telling me that your plan to save the universe is based on ‘Back to the Future'?
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: You're drifting left. One side, there, Lebowski.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Bitch, please. You’ve been to space.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: I think Nick Fury just hijacked our summer vacation.
author: ~ Peter Parker

quote: Uneasy lies the head that wears the crown. Stark said you wouldn't get that because it's not a Star Wars reference.
author: ~ Nick Fury

quote: Excuse me, sir! I can help! Let me help! I'm really strong and I'm… sticky!
author: ~ Peter Parker

quote: You handle the suit. I'll handle the music.
author: ~ Happy Hogan

quote: I’m gonna need a rain check on that dance.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: You’re in a relationship with me. Everything will never be okay.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I'm with you 'til the end of the line.
author: ~ Steve Rogers

quote: He may have been your father, boy, but he wasn’t your daddy.
author: ~ Yondu

quote: You can do it. You can do anything. You’re the world’s greatest grandma.
author: ~ Cassie

quote: Please know, when I drift off and be like everything lately, I'm fine. I'm totally fine. I dream about you. Because it's always you.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: I will buy all the cheeseburgers you want, just to keep that smile on your face.
author: ~ Happy Hogan

quote: I have to protect the one thing that I can’t live without. That’s you.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: When you look in her eyes and she’s looking back in yours…everything…feels…not quite normal.
author: ~ Peter Parker

quote: Let’s face it, this is not the worst thing you’ve caught me doing.
author: ~ Tony Stark

quote: Face it, Tiger, you just hit the jackpot.
author: ~ Mary Jane Watson

quote: I love you 3000.
author: ~ Tony Stark
